glosses: To provide a guest with comfort and to show them respect; to host, to entertain, to show hospitality towards.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish آغرلمق (ağırlamak, “to treat with marks of respect, to become heavy”), from Proto-Turkic *iagïrla- (“to honor, to serve”), from Proto-Turkic *iagïr- (“heavy”), equivalent to ağır + -la + -mak.
